# VEHICLE::ROLL_DOWN_WINDOWS

## Summary
:Removes all the vehicles windows

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Roll down all the windows of the vehicle passed through the first parameter.
